basic.Source: Bombina maxima (Giant fire-bellied toad) (Chinese red belly toad)
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.11835991] Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 (MIC=19.5 µg/ml), Klebsiella pneumoniae (MIC=9 µg/ml);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 2592 (MIC=19.5 µg/ml), Bacillus pyocyaneus CMCCB 10104 (MIC=19.5 µg/ml), Bacillus megatherium (MIC=19.5 µg/ml), Bacillus dysenteriae (MIC=2.7 µg/ml);Yeast:Candida albicans ATCC 2002 (MIC=3 µg/ml);Virus:HIV-1 (IC50=15.5 µg/ml, EC50=21.4 µg/ml);Cancer cell lines:C8166 (IC50=15.3 µg/ml), Molt-4 (IC50=24.3 µg/ml), BIU-87 (IC50=20.5 µg/ml), T24 (IC50=35.4 µg/ml).
